00092 /*
00093 ** ===============================================================
00094 ** some useful macros
00095 ** ===============================================================
00096 */
00097 
00098 #define luaL_argcheck(L, cond,numarg,extramsg)  \
00099     ((void)((cond) || luaL_argerror(L, (numarg), (extramsg))))
00100 #define luaL_checkstring(L,n) (luaL_checklstring(L, (n), NULL))
00101 #define luaL_optstring(L,n,d) (luaL_optlstring(L, (n), (d), NULL))
00102 #define luaL_checkint(L,n)  ((int)luaL_checkinteger(L, (n)))
00103 #define luaL_optint(L,n,d)  ((int)luaL_optinteger(L, (n), (d)))
00104 #define luaL_checklong(L,n) ((long)luaL_checkinteger(L, (n)))
00105 #define luaL_optlong(L,n,d) ((long)luaL_optinteger(L, (n), (d)))
00106 
00107 #define luaL_typename(L,i)  lua_typename(L, lua_type(L,(i)))
00108 
00109 #define luaL_dofile(L, fn) \
00110   (luaL_loadfile(L, fn) || lua_pcall(L, 0, LUA_MULTRET, 0))
00111 
00112 #define luaL_dostring(L, s) \
00113   (luaL_loadstring(L, s) || lua_pcall(L, 0, LUA_MULTRET, 0))
00114 
00115 #define luaL_getmetatable(L,n)  (lua_getfield(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, (n)))
00116 
00117 #define luaL_opt(L,f,n,d) (lua_isnoneornil(L,(n)) ? (d) : f(L,(n)))

00119 /*
00120 ** {======================================================
00121 ** Generic Buffer manipulation
00122 ** =======================================================
00123 */
00124 
00125 
00126 
00127 typedef struct luaL_Buffer {
00128   char *p;      /* current position in buffer */
00129   int lvl;  /* number of strings in the stack (level) */
00130   lua_State *L;
00131   char buffer[LUAL_BUFFERSIZE];
00132 } luaL_Buffer;
00133 
00134 #define luaL_addchar(B,c) \
00135   ((void)((B)->p < ((B)->buffer+LUAL_BUFFERSIZE) || luaL_prepbuffer(B)), \
00136    (*(B)->p++ = (char)(c)))
00137 
00138 /* compatibility only */
00139 #define luaL_putchar(B,c) luaL_addchar(B,c)
00140 
00141 #define luaL_addsize(B,n) ((B)->p += (n))
00142 
00143 LUALIB_API void (luaL_buffinit) (lua_State *L, luaL_Buffer *B);
00144 LUALIB_API char *(luaL_prepbuffer) (luaL_Buffer *B);
00145 LUALIB_API void (luaL_addlstring) (luaL_Buffer *B, const char *s, size_t l);
00146 LUALIB_API void (luaL_addstring) (luaL_Buffer *B, const char *s);
00147 LUALIB_API void (luaL_addvalue) (luaL_Buffer *B);
00148 LUALIB_API void (luaL_pushresult) (luaL_Buffer *B);

00154 /* compatibility with ref system */
00155 
00156 /* pre-defined references */
00157 #define LUA_NOREF       (-2)
00158 #define LUA_REFNIL      (-1)
00159 
00160 #define lua_ref(L,lock) ((lock) ? luaL_ref(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX) : \
00161       (lua_pushstring(L, "unlocked references are obsolete"), lua_error(L), 0))
00162 
00163 #define lua_unref(L,ref)        luaL_unref(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, (ref))
00164 
00165 #define lua_getref(L,ref)       lua_rawgeti(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, (ref))
